channel.title: Need to make skill bases
channel.description:
I'm on PwnScape3 source and some skills are missing and I never have done skills, here are the missing skills: RuneCrafting Farming(dont really need) Fletching Herblore Smithing Mining Fishing Cooking Firemaking.
I don't know if those are easy to fix, but I heard from somewhere that I could take the skills base from All-star or another source and put it in my source filesm if this is true I just need someone to tell me where to put it.
;3
Thanks-
Nate

item.title: Need to make skill bases

item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

I’m on PwnScape3 source and some skills are missing and I never have done skills, here are the missing skills:
RuneCrafting
Farming(dont really need)

Smithing

I don’t know if those are easy to fix, but I heard from somewhere that I could take the skills base from All-star or another source and put it in my source filesm if this is true I just need someone to tell me where to put it.
